name: Gunning out of Energy
description:
Gunning Out Of Energy is an top-down shooter where you take the role of Rob and make your way trough a deadly factory of violent and bloody robots (well... maybe not so bloody since they're made of steel)

Shoot all the robots you want, but remember, shooting costs power! Run out of it and you're dead. 

So what will you do? Will you buy that upgrade with your precious energy, or you'll leave it there and play safe? I don't know the answer! And neither do you, so go ahead, play it and figure it out yourself! 

WASD to move
E to interact
Left Click to shoot

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 43

Check out our Jam entry here (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/gunning-out-of-energy) - Give us a rating!

Coding: Alexander, Vinter
Art: Ants Aare
Music and Sound Effects: Vinter
Game Design: Alexander, Ants Aare, Vinter

Made with: Unity3D 
01-04/12/2018
